test.name: Verify user is navigated to brand page after search by brand by keyword

kw.name: Open chrome browser and redirect to brand page
Open chrome browser and redirect to page
kw.doc: Open chrome browser and redirect to page ${url} - Target url ${delay} - Delay that is waited after each Selenium command ${is_headless} - Turn on headless browser with True, default False

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait until page is completely loaded
Instrument Browser
kw.doc: Instruments the current webpage for testability. This should happen automatically vie SeleniumTestability's internal `Event Firing Webdriver` support but keyword is provided also. Calls `Inject Testability` keyword automatically.

kw.name: Wait For Testability Ready
kw.doc: Explicitly waits until testability is ready or timeout happens. Parameters: - ``timeout`` Amount of time to wait until giving up for testability to be ready. Robot framework timestring - ``error_on_timeout`` if timeout occurs, should we throw an error

kw.doc: Wait element is visible xpath=(//*[@id='txt-searchProductOnSearchBar'])[1] - Locator of target element 30 - Waiting time for target element visible

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify product detail page is navigated correctly with API verify
Wait until page is completely loaded
Instrument Browser
kw.doc: Instruments the current webpage for testability. This should happen automatically vie SeleniumTestability's internal `Event Firing Webdriver` support but keyword is provided also. Calls `Inject Testability` keyword automatically.

kw.name: Wait For Testability Ready
kw.doc: Explicitly waits until testability is ready or timeout happens. Parameters: - ``timeout`` Amount of time to wait until giving up for testability to be ready. Robot framework timestring - ``error_on_timeout`` if timeout occurs, should we throw an error

kw.name: Get Variable Value
kw.doc: Returns variable value or ``default`` if the variable does not exist.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

Format String

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

Remove String

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.arg: msg=Product original price with sku ${product_sku} display incorrectly
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Verify product discount price is displayed correctly
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
